nodes.label: let s = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;
s . keeper = ctx . accounts . keeper . key () ;

if ctx . accounts . state . approve_mode { token :: approve (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplApprove { to : ctx . accounts . holder . to_account_info () , delegate : ctx . accounts . spender . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . keeper . to_account_info () , } ,) , ctx . accounts . state . amount) ? ; }

token :: approve (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , SplApprove { to : ctx . accounts . holder . to_account_info () , delegate : ctx . accounts . spender . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . keeper . to_account_info () , } ,) , ctx . accounts . state . amount) ? ;

if ! ctx . accounts . state . approve_mode { token_2022 :: revoke (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token2022_program . to_account_info () , Revoke22 { source : ctx . accounts . holder22 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . keeper . to_account_info () , } ,)) ? ; }

token_2022 :: revoke (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token2022_program . to_account_info () , Revoke22 { source : ctx . accounts . holder22 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . keeper . to_account_info () , } ,)) ? ;
